example.en: He is reading a famous novel.

words.definition: A person in a book, film, or play.
words.arabic_definition: شخص في كتاب أو فيلم أو مسرحية.

example.en: The main character of the story is very brave.
example.ar: الشخصية الرئيسية في القصة شجاعة جداً.

words.definition: The main subject or idea of a book or story.
words.arabic_definition: الموضوع أو الفكرة الرئيسية لكتاب أو قصة.

example.en: The theme of the book is friendship.

words.definition: The act of telling a story.
The sequence of events in a story.

example.en: The plot of the novel is full of twists.

words.definition: A category of literature, music, or film.
words.arabic_definition: فئة من الأدب، الموسيقى، أو الأفلام.

words.definition: The most exciting point of the story.

example.en: The climax of the book was unexpected.

words.definition: A figure of speech used to compare things.

example.en: The writer used a beautiful metaphor.

words.definition: The mood or attitude of the writer.

example.en: The tone of the story was hopeful.
